snippet: Because of the success of our Summer Reading Contest, in which we posed this question weekly, we'll be asking it every Friday this fall. Bring your whole class!
abstract: Because of the success of our Summer Reading Contest, in which we posed this question weekly, we'll be asking it every Friday this fall. Bring your whole class!

byline.original: By KATHERINE SCHULTEN and MICHAEL GONCHAR

headline.main: What Interested You Most in The Times This Week?
